thread.title: Mukhriz sues Tunku Aziz for defamation over secret pact remarks
thread.title_full: Mukhriz sues Tunku Aziz for defamation over secret pact remarks

title: Mukhriz sues Tunku Aziz for defamation over secret pact remarks
text:
More 
Former Kedah menteri besar Mukhriz Mahathir has filed a defamation suit against former DAP vice chairperson Tunku Abdul Aziz Tunku Ibrahim, for alleging in late December and last month there was a secret pact between Dr Mahathir Mohamad and DAP stalwart Lim Kit Siang. 
The suit was filed today at the Kuala Lumpur High Court registry through the firm of Haniff Khatri. 
In his statement of claim, Mukhriz who is also Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia deputy president, alleged the 73-year-old Tunku Aziz's claim that former premier Dr Mahathir Mohamad had conspired with Lim to make Mukhriz PM and Lim deputy prime minister if the opposition wins.
